title: fix: PSv2 - Tasks are queued, worker sees job but no tasks
summary: When an async job is started, it appears that the tasks get queued, and the worker sees the job, but the worker sees zero tasks to complete. In Antenna, I start a job and it appears that all tasks are queued successfully:.

title: Update how the status of processing services are checked & reported
summary: For async processing services (distributed workers), the `server_live` status should be set by the view each time we hear from the processing service. For v1 synchronous processing services with an endpoint_url, those can still be set by the status c.

title: Review M2M permissions for things that belong to multiple projects
summary: Django-guardian provides object-level permissions on model instances but **does not natively support permissions on M2M relationships**. This means a user with permission on Object A could potentially manipulate M2M relationships to associate it with.

title: feat: PSv2 - Have visibility into which workers are subscribed to a job
summary: Can we show which consumers/workers are subscribed to a stream in the job logs? Or status screen? And/or the processing service registration list? NATS seems to make this easy to retrieve which is awesome.

title: PSv2: Workers should not try to fetch tasks from v1 jobs
summary: The worker seems to be finding jobs that are not in async projects - just any open job (maybe no tasks are added to it, but the job is found).

title: Use timezone.now() for Django CMS timestamps while keeping local times for SourceImage
summary: In PR #987, a code review suggested using `timezone.now()` instead of `datetime.now()` for the Job model's `finished_at` field. This change was deferred due to the nuanced timezone requirements in the codebase.

title: Standardize exception logging to use logger.exception() across codebase
summary: In PR #987, a code review suggested using `logger.exception()` instead of `logger.error()` for exception handling. This change was deferred because it should be applied consistently across the entire codebase rather than in a single PR.

title: Refactor role-project relationship to use foreign key instead of string parsing
summary: The relationship between permission groups ("roles") and projects is currently handled by a specially crafted name (string) of the group. I would prefer we implement a custom Group model and add a `project_id` field. This will simplify a number of qu.

title: Support for non-time series data
summary: There is an interest in using Antenna for batch ID of multi-subject images, which are NOT from a monitoring station or a sequential time series (museum drawers, images from dissection scopes, field collected specimens (bugbox), stiched DSLR photos, e.

title: Save detection images as PNG instead of JPG
summary: The detection images are generally very small (10kb) jpgs. It is convenient to use them directly for re-training without having to refetch the original images. But the jpg compression has a meaningful effect on images this small.

title: [IaC] Pulumi scripts for AWS deployment
summary: [IaC] Pulumi scripts for AWS deployment

title: PSv2: Service "live" status for async processing services
summary: In the asynchonous/pull model, antenna doesn't have an endpoint to call on the services to check for liveness. Instead, the service workers poll antenna for work to do. We need to update the status of such services to show as "live" based on the time.

title: PSv2: Pipeline registration for async processing services

Celery workers may be creating "Zombie Tasks" due to a **1-hour RabbitMQ connection hard close** caused by the OpenStack network's idle timeout. The existing Linux default TCP Keepalive is too slow, leading to failed task completion reports.

    * type: kmeans

    * jobs: [Job]
    * taxa: [Taxon]

title: Fix ml backend from creating duplicate classifications
summary: There is a loop somewhere that is duplicating the number of detections or classifications for every detection. So if there are 4 detections, there will be 16 classifications sent back to Antenna! If there are 100 detections, 10,000 are sent back! The Antenna side filters these duplicates, however it greatly slows down the image processing.

title: Add filters UI to "identified by" filters

We need some UI controls here.

title: Add filters UI to jobs
summary:
These fields can be used now to filter the API response:
- `source_image_collection` (for both ML jobs and new collection population jobs)
- `deployment_id` (for data sync jobs)
- `pipeline_id`
- `status` (may need to align frontend/backend status values for this)

These need to be added
- `source_image_single` (read-only filter, when a single image is processed from session detail)
- `job_type` (static list of choices, perhaps the jobs list view provides this?)

This will help to view running jobs associated with collections & deployment syncing.

title: Add object-level permissions for Projects & related entities
summary: All API endpoints should only list or provide access to objects that the current user is allowed to see. And each object should specify if the current user can edit or take other actions on it.

title: Add endpoint for searching taxa (species)
summary: Begin with searching the taxa in our database. Consider a 2nd stage search that reaches out to the GBIF & iNaturalist APIs and add species to our database if selected.

title: Add endpoints for species identification
summary: See https://github. com/RolnickLab/ami-platform/pull/214.

title: Add endpoints for user authentication
summary:
Following the patterns in this guide: https://testdriven. io/blog/django-spa-auth/

In our case, the frontend is served separately (cross domain) - although it doesn't need to be!

title: Add project filters
summary:
When we fetch a group of items, we sometimes want to filter based on project id. Deployments and jobs endpoints have this filter, I could need a similar one for:
- /status/summary
- /occurrences
- /events
- /species

Deployments example: https://api.

title: Detections are no longer showing in session playback
summary: I believe I removed them from the SourceImage serializer while doing some optimization. I am hoping to reduce the number of queries and cache them.

title: Add threshold control
summary: Based on this setting, we want to control what detections to show in the playback frame. Also, we need this for #198.
